Control Name: 1.1.9 Azure Hybrid Use Benefit is used to drive down cost in the cloud.
Control Statement: Understanding your current spending on licenses can help you drive down cost in the cloud. A-HUB allows you to reuse licenses that you purchased for on-premises in Azure and via this drive down the cost as the license is already paid.
